full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 87 of 236 991 LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross 1 A. Yes. Sometimes she took a couple minutes and walk out with business cards and that she did, I imagine that she was doing the recruiting. 2 3 THE COURT: Okay. He read it. Thank you. Next 4 question. 5 6 Q. And the business cards are from places like The Breakers; 7 right? 8 A. I don't know, sir. I never saw the business cards. They 9 were -- she came out with in her hands. I didn't ask it to 10 give it to me. I was never -- they were never given to me. 11 But we went to from the most exclusive spas and country clubs 12 from -- in the country of Palm Beach and I was the driver. 13 Q. Well, you kept a Rolodex, Mr. Alessi; correct? 14 A. True. 15 Q. And the Rolodex you had kept cards in it from the spas; 16 right? 17 A. No. It had cards from the names of the repeat woman who 18 came to the house and massage therapists. 19 MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can show the witness 3504-030, 20 page 8, deposition page 30, lines 5 through 7. 21 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I don't believe this is 22 inconsistent. 23 THE COURT: Sustained. 24 Q. Do you recall, Mr. Alessi, that you got referrals from 25 other people for massage therapists? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012601
